data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Kronoberg, Sweden.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kronoberg, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Kronoberg to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary: On average, 24 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kronoberg, Sweden.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kronoberg, Sweden. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Kronoberg, Sweden to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Arab, Libyan people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, please defend the 10,681 believers in Kronoberg against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, encourage the church of Kronoberg, Sweden that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary:
the state of Kronoberg, Sweden has a population of 185,900.

We estimate Kronoberg has 10,681 people who might know Jesus, 93,171 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 82,048 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 17 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Kronoberg.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
